title: Pork Larb
source: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
categories: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
ingredients: ¼teaspoon toasted Thai red chile powder (see Tip), or ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes
2tablespoons fresh lime juice (from 1 lime), plus 4 lime wedges for serving
1cup shredded green cabbage or whole small cabbage leaves, for serving
directions: In a large heavy skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the pork and ¼ teaspoon salt and cook, breaking up the meat into tiny pieces with a wooden spoon, until cooked through, 4 to 5 minutes. (Don’t worry about browning the meat; just get it cooked.) Transfer the meat to a bowl.

In a separate bowl, whisk the toasted rice powder, chile powder, lime juice, and fish sauce. Add the sauce to the pork. Toss in the onion, scallion, cilantro, and mint. Season to taste with salt and white pepper. Serve with lime wedges, cabbage, and rice.
